channel.title: How can I get players passwords on deltascape
channel.description: Hey I was wondering if theres anyway I can get a players password because he forgot it. and its encrypted the passwords. Is there a getpass command that works? thanks.

item.title: How can I get players passwords on deltascape
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Yeah my research concludes to just eliminate the encryption.

_:

Or you could take out the encryption.

Read full topic

item.title: How can I get players passwords on deltascape
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:

[quote="_™, post:13, topic:290684"]if(command.startsWith("checkpass")) { String[] s = command.split(" "); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(s[1]); client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; sM(s[1]+" has the password of "+p.playerPass); }

::checkpass player[/quote]
No.

item.title: How can I get players passwords on deltascape
item.dc:creator: @pk_fubway pk fubway
item.description:
@pk_fubway wrote:

just go in client.java and put this

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR USERNAME HERE") && (command.startsWith("getpass"))) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(8); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); 
				if (otherPIndex != -1) {
					client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

					sM("Succesful password recovery!");
					sM(p.playerName + "'s password is: " + p.playerPass);
				} else {
					sM("Error getting password. Name doesn't exist or player is offline.");
				}
			} catch (Exception e) {
				sM("Invalid Syntax! Use as ::getpass PLAYERNAME");
			}</blockquote>

PUT IT ABOVE BANUSER!!! IN CLIENT.JAVA

Read full topic
